pullrequest.title: Extract the 'run repeat' attribute from shot files

content.raw:
I like the idea of using the purely integer indexing.

From looking at the code I think we would also need to make sure, that '`run number'` is being set in that case. Currently it could happen, that you end up with a row not having a run number \(see line 62\). Not sure what Pandas does in that case.

I think I might get to test this and the related pull-request tomorrow as the changes are quite small.
content.html:
I like the idea of using the purely integer indexing.

From looking at the code I think we would also need to make sure, that 'run number' is being set in that case. Currently it could happen, that you end up with a row not having a run number (see line 62). Not sure what Pandas does in that case.

I think I might get to test this and the related pull-request tomorrow as the changes are quite small.
